Page.ScreenName: Overdue Miscellaneous Po's By Po Number
Page.Table:
PMC:ReportSelectionTable
Enter Owning Division No. or (ALL) Text PPDField01 1 3 R Enter Division # or (ALL)
Enter Beginning Date (MM/DD/YY) Text PPDField02 6 8 R Enter a beginning date in the form (MM/DD/YY)
Enter Ending Date (MM/DD/YY) Text PPDField03 6 8 R Enter an ending date in the form (MM/DD/YY)
Enter Vendor No. or (ALL) Text PPDField04 1 8 R Enter a valid vendor # or (ALL)
Enter P/O No. or (ALL) Text PPDField05 1 8 R Enter a valid P/O # or (ALL)
